title: More Chart Customization
description: There are many options for customizing different types of charts. In this program, explore some of these options in the tray. You may decide to hide or show outliers, patterns, and the legend. You might even choose to change the position of the legend or flip the chart direction.
hint: Drag some of the blocks in the tray and place them after the chart is generated but before the chart is displayed. Then run the program.
